name: Rage Blade
description:
(Note: Enter full-screen mode or download for the best experience!)

Welcome to RAGE BLADE!

A game created by John Cervantes for DMD 2542

You play as an accursed sword that was cast away by the hero, transforming from a blade of honor to a blade of rage. A Rage Blade, if you will.

You swear vengeance on this unforgiving world! Cut down hordes of monsters and even your fellow Rage Weapons! Build up your rage and UNLEASH IT!

GAMEPLAY:

This game is an endless turn-based RPG battle, where enemies will randomly spawn in one after the other.

You play as the Rage Blade. Make sure your HEALTH METER doesn't drop to 0, and charge up your pink RAGE METER to use special moves!

You gain 1 Rage when you are attacked by an enemy. The enemy also gains 1 Rage when you attack it.

You have four options to choose from at the start of your turn:

ATTACK: You take a swing at the enemy, dealing damage.

HEAL: Consume 1 Rage to restore half your HP.

DEFEND: Reduces an enemy's attack damage to 1, and builds up 3 Rage.

UNLEASH: You can one of these special moves when your Rage meter is full! Each move consumes 10 Rage.

PURGE: A better Attack. A devastating one-shot attack.

CATHARSIS: A better Heal. Fully restore your HP.

SPURN: A better Defend. Completely block an enemy's attack, building up half your Rage meter and reflecting the hit back to the enemy.

Cut down your enemies and get the highest kill streak! But watch out! Enemies can build up their Rage meter too, and unleash a Purge at you!

Cut down enough enemies, and you might find that other Rage Weapons seek your downfall too, such as the mighty RAGE BOMB and RAGE AXE.

The Rage Bomb enters combat fully charged with rage, ready to throw a Purge at you. Make sure you DEFEND to absorb all of its rage for yourself!

Meanwhile, the Rage Axe is a formidable foe, with no weaknesses. Do your best to fell this enemy!

Go forth, and RAGE!
